member_organisations:
YEU has membership of organizations, not of natural persons, but our activities are open for all interested young individuals.  
List of YEU member organizations can be found here: http://www.yeu-international.org/en/members/member-organisations
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Borders and Security, Communication
eu_initiatives:
YEU is following:  
- process of validation of non-formal education 
- initiatives related to youth work 
- visa code and visa directive 
- Structured Dialogue process 
-Erasmus plus implementation 
- Solidarity Corps 
-Europass revision
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: YEU policy statements and papers, as well as publications can be found here: http://www.yeu-international.org/en/publications
